mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, category_id, price, description, image, is_active, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{description}, #{image}, #{isActive}, #{createAt});
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, description, image, is_active FROM product ORDER BY product_id ) p LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT po.product_id AS productId, po.option_id AS optionId, po.quantity AS quantity, ao.option_name AS optionName, ao.max_quantity AS maxQuantity, ao.option_price AS optionPrice FROM product_option po JOIN additional_option ao on ao.option_id = po.option_id WHERE po.product_id = #{product_id}
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, description, image, is_active FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, description, image, is_active FROM product WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
